data.name: Agonizing Blast
data.value: When you cast eldritch blast, add your Charisma modifier to the damage it deals on a hit.

data.name: Armor of Shadows
data.value: You can cast mage armor on yourself at will, without expending a spell slot or material components.

data.name: Ascendant Step
data.value: You can cast levitate on yourself at will, without expending a spell slot or material components.

data.name: Beast Speech
data.value: You can cast speak with animals at will, without expending a spell slot.

data.name: Beguiling Influence
data.value: You gain proficiency in the Deception and Persuasion skills.

data.name: Bewitching Whispers
data.value: You can cast compulsion once using a warlock spell slot. You can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.

data.name: Book of Ancient Secrets
data.value: You can now inscribe magical rituals in your Book of Shadows. Choose two 1st-level spells that have the ritual tag from any class’s spell list (the two needn’t be from the same list). The spells appear in the book and don’t count against the number of spells you know. With your Book of Shadows in hand, you can cast the chosen spells as rituals. You can’t cast the spells except as rituals, unless you’ve learned them by some other means. You can also cast a warlock spell you know as a ritual if it has the ritual tag. On your adventures, you can add other ritual spells to your Book of Shadows. When you find such a spell, you can add it to the book if the spell’s level is equal to or less than half your warlock level (rounded up) and if you can spare the time to transcribe the spell. For each level of the spell, the transcription process takes 2 hours and costs 50 gp for the rare inks needed to inscribe it.

data.name: Chains of Carceri
data.value: You can cast hold monsterat will—targeting a celestial, fiend, or elemental—without expending a spell slot or material components. You must finish a long rest before you can use this invocation on the same creature again.

data.name: Devil's Sight
data.value: You can see normally in darkness, both magical and nonmagical, to a distance of 120 feet.

data.name: Dreadful Word
data.value: You can cast confusiononce using a warlock spell slot. You can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.

data.name: Eldritch Sight
data.value: You can cast detect magic at will, without expending a spell slot.

data.name: Eldritch Spear
data.value: When you cast eldritch blast, its range is 300 feet.

data.name: Eyes of the Rune Keeper
data.value: You can read all writing.

data.name: Fiendish Vigor
data.value: You can cast false life on yourself at will as a 1st-level spell, without expending a spell slot or material components.

data.name: Gaze of Two Minds
data.value: You can use your action to touch a willing humanoid and perceive through its senses until the end of your next turn. As long as the creature is on the same plane of existence as you, you can use your action on subsequent turns to maintain this connection, extending the duration until the end of your next turn. While perceiving through the other creature’s senses, you benefit from any special senses possessed by that creature, and you areblinded and deafened to your own surroundings.

data.name: Lifedrinker
data.value: When you hit a creature with your pact weapon, the creature takes extra necrotic damage equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum 1).

data.name: Mask of Many Faces
data.value: You can cast disguise self at will, without expending a spell slot.

data.name: Master of Myriad Forms
data.value: You can cast alter selfat will, without expending a spell slot.

data.name: Minions of Chaos
data.value: You can cast conjure elemental once using a warlock spell slot. You can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.

data.name: Mire the Mind
data.value: You can cast slowonce using a warlock spell slot. You can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.

data.name: Misty Visions
data.value: You can cast silent image at will, without expending a spell slot or material components.

data.name: One with Shadows
data.value: When you are in an area of dim light or darkness, you can use your action to become invisible until you move or take an action or areaction.

data.name: Otherworldy Leap
data.value: You can cast jumpon yourself at will, without expending a spell slot or material components.

data.name: Repelling Blast
data.value: When you hit a creature with eldritch blast, you can push the creature up to 10 feet away from you in a straight line.

data.name: Sculptor of Flesh
data.value: You can cast polymorph once using a warlock spell slot. You can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.

data.name: Sign of Ill Omen
data.value: You can cast bestow curse once using a warlock spell slot. You can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.

data.name: Thief of Five Fates
data.value: You can cast baneonce using a warlock spell slot. You can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.

data.name: Thirsting Blade
data.value: You can attack with your pact weapon twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

data.name: Visions of Distant Realms
data.value: You can cast arcane eyeat will, without expending a spell slot.

data.name: Voice of the Chain Master
data.value: You can communicate telepathically with your familiar and perceive through your familiar’s senses as long as you are on the same plane of existence. Additionally, while perceiving through your familiar’s senses, you can also speak through your familiar in your own voice, even if your familiar is normally incapable of speech.

data.name: Whispers of the Grave
data.value: You can cast speak with dead at will, without expending a spell slot.

data.name: Witch Sight
data.value: You can see the true form of any shapechanger or creature concealed by illusion or transmutation magic while the creature is within 30 feet of you and within line of sight.
